channel.title: dotfiles on Cat Cai
channel.description: Recent content in dotfiles on Cat Cai

item.title: Dotfiles and The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up
item.description: I’m excited to announce that I’m now the proud (and broke) owner of a brand new 15” Macbook Pro (2017). I know, I know. I should have waited until Fall 2018 for Apple to announce a refresh. My rationale for getting the new laptop is mostly that I had been waiting for a refresh at WWDC. If none came, I was going to get one anyway since I’ve been holding off for a long time.
